review: Very professional and polite. Was very kind, even though I was a bit late. Explained everything in a way that I understood. Overall was a good experience!

My father was suffering from pain in the hip area as his hip joint was damaged due to an accident. we have consulted Doctor Belliappa and he preferred to have a THR surgery.. Throughout the process he helped us in understanding the criticality of the surgery and also had immense patience to clarify all our doubts. Thank you so much sir for your extended hand of help.
